message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6800. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell it to you for $7200.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $6900?
I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell it to you for $7000, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept.
